entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Bella Bella
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:11 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, 1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bella Bella Airport 7:23 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: 1.2°C
Pressure: 99.7 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 0.2°C
Wind: SSW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A
